name: Demilitarized Zone
description: Return all structures on this planet to your reinforcements. Then, return all ground forces on this planet to the space area. ATTACH: Units cannot be committed to, produced on or placed on this planet. During the agenda phase, this planet's planet card can be traded as part of a transaction.

name: Dyson Sphere
description: ATTACH: This planet's resource value is increased by 2 and its influence value is increased by 1.

name: Freelancers
description: You may produce 1 unit in this system; you may spend influence as if it were resources to produce this unit.

name: Gamma Wormhole
description: Place a gamma wormhole token in this system. Then, purge this card.

name: Mercenary Outfit
description: You may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on this planet.

name: Paradise World
description: ATTACH: This planet's influence value is increased by 2.

name: Tomb of Emphidia
description: ATTACH: This planet's influence value is increased by 1. If the player who has the "Crown of Emphidia" relic has control of this planet, they can use that relic to gain 1 Victory Point.

name: Cultural Relic Fragment
description: ACTION: Purge 3 of your cultural relic fragments to gain 1 Relic.

name: Abandoned Warehouses
description: You may gain 2 commodities, or you may convert up to 2 of your commodities to trade goods.

name: Biotic Research Facility
description: ATTACH: This planet has a green technology specialty; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

name: Cybernetic Research Facility
description: ATTACH: This planet has a yellow technology specialty; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

name: Functioning Base
description: You may gain 1 commodity, or you may spend 1 trade good or 1 commodity to draw 1 action card.

name: Local Fabricators
description: You may gain 1 commodity, or you may spend 1 trade good or 1 commodity to place 1 mech from your reinforcements on this planet.

name: Propulsion Research Facility
description: ATTACH: This planet has a blue technology specialty; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

name: Industrial Relic Fragment
description: ACTION: Purge 3 of your industrial relic fragments to gain 1 Relic.

name: Core Mine
description: If you have at least 1 mech on this planet, or if you remove 1 infantry from this planet, gain 1 trade good.

name: Expedition
description: If you have at least 1 mech on this planet or if you remove 1 infantry from this planet, ready this planet.

name: Lazax Survivors
description: ATTACH: This planet's resource value is increased by 1 and its influence value is increased by 2.

name: Mining World
description: ATTACH: This planet's resource value is increased by 2.

name: Rich World
description: ATTACH: This planet's resource value is increased by 1.

name: Volatile Fuel Source
description: If you have at least 1 mech on this planet, or if you remove 1 infantry from this planet, gain 1 command token.

name: Warfare Research Facility
description: ATTACH: This planet has a red technology specialty; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

name: Hazardous Relic Fragment
description: ACTION: Purge 3 of your hazardous relic fragments to gain 1 Relic.

name: Derelict Vessel
description: Draw 1 secret objective.

name: Enigmatic Device
description: Place this card face up in your play area. ACTION: You may spend 6 resources and purge this card to research 1 technology.

name: Gamma Relay
description: Place a gamma wormhole token in this system. Then, purge this card.

name: Ion Storm
description: Place the ion storm token in this system with either side face up. Then, place this card in the common play area. At the end of a "Move Ships" or "Retreat" sub-step of a tactical action during which 1 or more of your ships use the ion storm wormhole, flip the ion storm token to its opposing side.

name: Lost Crew
description: Draw 2 action cards.

name: Merchant Station
description: You may replenish your commodities, or you may convert your commodities to trade goods.

name: Mirage
description: Place the Mirage planet token in this system. Gain the Mirage planet card and ready it. Then, purge this card.

name: Unknown Relic Fragment
description: This card counts as a relic fragment of any type.

name: Dead World
description: Draw 1 relic.

name: Entropic Field
description: Gain 1 command token and 2 trade goods.

name: Keleres Ship
description: Gain 2 command tokens.

name: Major Entropic Field
description: Gain 1 command token and 3 trade goods.

name: Minor Entropic Field
description: Gain 1 command token and 1 trade good.
